column4: who is a good ubuntu based vps cheap?  with java and posgress perhaps?
why do you care if the use ubuntu or not? and jumpline.com is the best
for just html I don't.. if it's a vm.. I do..
none for ubuntu specific, i dont think youll fine many/any
for just static? for including postgress?

jumpline.com... theres a coupon for a free year, otherwise u can get it fro 2.95$ a month if you go halfway thru the signup then back out (its $3.50 a month otherwise)... the hosts ping the fastest for me of any cheap host
and tech support answers/fixes in under 20 minutes usually
its by eticket, so they at least type english
they dont ping as well for me.. just test it from the console and see what kinda response rate u get
if you look real hard u can find the coupon for afree year
